root.name: Guild Wars Bonus Mission Pack
root.description: The Guild Wars Bonus Mission Pack lets you play through four missions that cover historical events: The Flight North, The Battle of Jahai, the Rise of the White Mantle and the Tengu Accords. All of the missions can be accessed through the Story books given by Durmand which you can find in Lions Arch, Kaineng City and Lion's Arch.MissionsThe Battle of JahaiThis Mission tells of the famous battle between Turai Ossa and Palawa Joko on the night that Palawa Joko is finally defeated.The Tengu AccordsThis mission is played in Master Togo's perspective as He tries to negotiate a Peace treaty with the Tengu.Rise of the MantleIn this Mission, Saul D'alessio must try and Force the Charr legions from Kryta.The Flight NorthPlay as Gwen as she evades the charr and meets the Ebon Vanguard.

similar_games.game: Final Fantasy XIV Online: A Realm Reborn
